data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
HTTP::Recorder records interactions with web sites and generates
    scripts for playback.

    Modules like WWW::Mechanize are great for creating automated
    scripts, but writing these scripts can be tedious and prone to
    errors. HTTP::Recorder allows users to interact with web sites
    through their usual browser, and generated scripts for playback.

    HTTP::Recorder generates WWW::Mechanize scripts by default, but
    supports the use of other logging modules.
